ValidationRule.description: Country is mandatory for record type Operation Exception for all profiles except ICONICS_Warehouse
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $User.BypassVR__c ), NOT( $User.ProfileId = $Setup.IconicsSettings__c.ICONICSWarehouseProfileID__c), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Operation_Exception", ISPICKVAL(Country__c , ""), ISPICKVAL(TECH_Country__c , "") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have to complete the country
